attributes.action: Safer streets for billingham with police patrols
attributes.additional_details: Billingham is over run with crime, every night robbings, muggings of children and elderly, burglaries and thefts are happening more and more the culprits are known to the police
attributes.background: Provide more policing for the streets of billingham

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an operational decision for the local police service.
